sense.def:
One's voice
je tisto, kar slišimo, ko nekdo govori.

seg.quote: He recognized me by my voice.
‘I suppose we'd better go,’ said John in a low voice.

sense.def:
One's voice
je tudi človekovo mnenje o določenem vprašanju in tisto, kar reče o tem.

seg.quote: Numerous voices were raised against the idea.
The only dissenting voice was Mr Foot's.

sense.def:
To have a voice in something
pomeni imeti pravico, da izrazimo svoje mnenje o nečem.

seg.quote: Students should have a voice in determining the way universities develop.

sense.def:
To voice an opinion or an emotion
pomeni povedati svoje mnenje ali občutke.

seg.quote: The African delegates voiced their anger.

sense.def:
Kadar je glagol
in the active voice
, je v tvorni obliki, ki pove, da osebek izraža vršilca dejanja. Kadar je glagol
in the passive voice
, je v trpni obliki, ki pove, da osebek izraža osebo ali stvar, prizadeto v glagolskem dejanju.

To raise one's voice
pomeni govoriti glasneje.
To lower one's voice
pomeni govoriti tiše.

Kadar nam nekdo reče
keep your voice down
, zahteva, da govorimo tiše.

Kadar nekdo nekaj reče
at the top of one's voice
, tisto reče zelo glasno.

seg.quote: ‘I am drenched,’ she declared at the top of her voice.
